descriptions.app_description: A brief description of the application functionality.

key_features: Format messages based on predefined templates or logic.
Send formatted responses back to the channel.
Log message formatting activity for auditing purposes.

settings.label: List of Skills required
settings.description: List of skill to detect in the scanned document

settings.label: Minimum Skill Match
settings.description: Set the minimum number of required skill matches (1 - 10).

settings.label: Enable Webhook Notifications
settings.description: Enable or disable webhook notifications for skill matches.

settings.label: Custom Webhook URL
settings.description: Provide a custom webhook URL for receiving notifications.

settings.label: Auto-Reject If No Match
settings.description: Automatically reject resumes if no skills match.

settings.label: Auto-Approve If High Match
settings.description: Automatically approve resumes with 80%+ skill match.

data.author: Ali Ogochukwu Peter
